idea-plugin.name: Jump To Usage
idea-plugin.description:
Simple plugin to make navigation to element usages easier than using Alt+F7. Works similar to Ctrl+Alt+F7 in Resharper. Default key binding is to Alt+Shift+F7 since in Linux, Ctrl+Alt+F7 is taken up for switching to virtual console 7 (typically the one running your current X session).
Comes with no configuration page. If you want something to be configurable, let me know and it'll be added. Bouquets and Brickbats are welcome :)
